explicit-path.description: Configure explicit path. When a TE LSP is to be established, specify route hop constraints for the LSP.

hop.description: Configure route hop. Operations such as CFG restart and mixed command configuration may cause the index value to change.

mode.description: Route hop mode, IPv4 or IPv6 address, segment label or SID IPv6 label.

er-hop-type.description: Route hop type. Stictly included: A route hop must be included in a LSP path. Loosely included: A route hop is included in a LSP path if the hop meets path constraints and excluded if the hop does not meet path constraints. Excluded: A route hop is excluded fron the LSP path.

address-type.description: Address type. IPv4 is only supported.

address.description: IP address of a route hop.

sid-label-type.description: SID label type of the explicit route hop.

sid-label.description: SID label of the explicit route hop.

sid-ipv6.description: SID IPv6 label of the explicit route hop.

sid-ipv6-label-type.description: SID IPv6 label type of the explicit route hop.

affinity-mappings.description: List of the affinity mappings configuration.
